thread.title: New York Getaway
thread.title_full: New York Getaway - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 124cherik
title: New York Getaway
text: Great location! The Benjamin is near 5th Ave. shopping and close to great restaurants. The suites are a minimum of 450 Sq. feet, luxurious according to New York standards. The suite deal promotions are a great value. Room 803 had a walk-in closet, an over-sized walk-in shower and double sinks. This staff is very helpful and friendly. A stop in the Frederico Salon to have Marco work his magic on your hair should be on your must-do list!
